comment.author: 14279793@N06
comment._content: Boy, that Thomas Morse Scout has been drastically modified !

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/landoni] Yes! Here is a bit more info, written by T.C. Ryan himself "LeRhone rotary was replaced by an OX-5.  Performance not as good because of added weight of radiator.  This is plane George Allen took out for a flight against my instructions and had a forced landing breaking the prop." This appears to be another view of the image [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/5683859791/]
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives

comment.author: 14279793@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives] ... Thank you for the additional info. ... That was part of the beauty of the LeRhone, no cooling system. ... I added some tags to help people find this photo. ... You might consider adding this photo to some Flickr groups like www.flickr.com/groups/37996573424@N01/ www.flickr.com/groups/96389894@N00/ www.flickr.com/groups/aeronautical/ www.flickr.com/groups/flyingmachines/ ... to name just a few
